text: Rocky Mount Mills, located in Rocky Mount, North Carolina, was the second cotton mill built in the state of North Carolina. It was built in 1816. Capitol Broadcasting Company bought the mills in 2007 and has since made it into a mixed-use campus of breweries, restaurants, lofts, offices, and event space. ==References== Category:1816 establishments in the United States Category:National Register of Historic Places
title: Rocky Mount Mills
